title: PROJECT Skins
body: So when are the project skins actually going to be able to be brought? I've heard that it's a week after the patch, I've also heard that it's a day after the patch, I'm hoping it's not a week after the patch... Already waited long enough for them.

replies.body: The Friday after Kled comes out probably. It's usually Friday two days after the patch comes out.

Based on how skins and such have been released in previous patches, I'd say that it's most likely to happen during the weekend (as far as I'm aware, that's *usually* how it happens). Of course, the new Project skins are bringing in entirely new concepts with them, so it *may* be sometime next week because of that. Only way to know for sure is to be patient.
Most likely a 3 days to a week after the patch.
